author: Topsen
post_text: March 27, 2017 at 12:56 PM#1Good morning,i got a question aboute Search and Replace macro:I got the Syntax from the MA Help side and made a Macro:Line 1: Search Selection /ncLine 2: Replace Attribute "Pan"  At -270  Thru 270  With -265  Thru 275  If SearchResult /nc(Line 1+2 is a direct copy from the macro line in MA)But if i select a Fixture and push the macro, the Fixture turns around and goes into max. position instead of doing a 10 degree rotation.If i doubletap the Fixture to activate the position attribute it works, but i can't update it via "Update" nor it changes every preset/cue. I have to merge it into the preset.
title: Search and Replace doesn't work
